title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. V, subch. E, art. 1, pt. 562 - Instructions-balance Sheet Accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. V, subch. E, art. 1, pt. 562 - Instructions-balance Sheet Accounts

State Regulations
§ 562.1 - Current and accrued assets
§ 562.2 - Current and accrued liabilities
§ 562.3 to 562.9 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. V, subch. E, art. 1, pt. 562

Statutory authority: Public Service Law, §89-c, subd. 3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
